### Chart B - Grafico 02

```{r}
#fazer o grafico 02

# renderPlotly({
#    tq_get(c("PETR4.SA", "BBAS3.SA",
 #             "VALE3.SA", "WEGE3.SA"))
#   dados_tbl() %>% 
#   ggplot(aes(x = date, y = adjusted, color = symbol)) + 
#   geom_line()
# })

#remover: dados_tbl()

renderPlotly({
    tq_get(c("PETR4.SA", "BBAS3.SA",
              "VALE3.SA", "WEGE3.SA")) %>% 
    group_by(symbol) %>%
    mutate(cotacao = (adjusted - mean(adjusted))/ sd( adjusted)) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
   ggplot(aes(x = date, y = adjusted, color = symbol)) + 
   geom_line()
 })

```
